about_the_game:
“Singularity Survivors” throws you into the heart of a post-apocalyptic realm where the very essence of survival is put to the test in a vast, open-world environment. As a multiplayer survival game that demands wit, will, and strategy, you’re not just fighting to live — you’re crafting a new world from the ashes of the old. Build, collaborate, and battle against the remnants of a society overrun by mutants, treacherous robots, and unspeakable evils.

In this hauntingly beautiful wasteland, the remnants of human ingenuity lie scattered across multiple sprawling towns, ripe for exploration and loot. Forge alliances or claim dominance as you navigate through the urban decay of civilization’s last echoes.

Features List:

  • Expansive Open World: Freely explore numerous massive towns and diverse landscapes, each with their own secrets, dangers, and resources.
  • Survival at its Core: Manage hunger, thirst, health, and stamina as you struggle to balance the basics of survival with the risks of the unknown.
  • Base Building: Claim your territory and construct a safe haven with a robust shelter-building system, upgrading from wood to stone to iron.
  • Item Crafting: Utilize a comprehensive crafting system to create tools, weapons, and gear essential for survival.
  • Enemy Encounters: Face off against a variety of foes including mutants and rogue robots, each with unique behaviors and weaknesses.
  • Multiplayer Interaction: Join forces with other players for cooperative play or engage in PvP for competitive excitement.
  • Loot and Scavenge: Hunt for valuable resources in the ruins to build, craft, and survive.
  • Dynamic Day/Night Cycle: Prepare for the dangers that lurk when night falls in a world that changes with the time of day.
  • Environmental Challenges: Navigate through radiation storms, acid rain, and snowstorms that add complexity to survival.
  • Dynamic Weather System: Experience a realistic weather system that affects gameplay and survival tactics.
  • XP/Leveling System: Gain XP from every action to level up and strengthen your health, stamina, hunger, and thirst management.
  • Quest (Missions) System: Engage in various missions to uncover the story and gain rewards.
  • Regular Updates: Ongoing content updates that introduce new challenges, features, and enhancements.
  • Community-Driven Development: A development team that listens to the community, shaping the game to the players’ vision.

Join us on this journey and see if you have what it takes to survive and thrive in the world of “Singularity Survivors.”

  • Processor: 8th Gen intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 11th Gen intel core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
